name: Kame Paradise 2
storyline: Roshi's at it again, except this time he's got a time machine at his disposal, going around through different eras to meet female characters from the past, present, and future in Dragon Ball's History.
summary: Kame Paradise 2, made by Yamamoto Doujin, is a sequel to Kame Paradise, being a Dragon Ball Hentai Game released on November 23rd, 2021. It is part of a series of games made by Yamamoto. It is a R+18 Adult Hentai game featuring Dragon Ball Characters from Dragon Ball: Original, Z, GT, and Super. This entry has character from Original, Z, GT, and Super, as opposed to the first game which mostly just focuses on characters from Original Dragon Ball.
